functions.tag: {pages:['{"text":"Arianok, \\n\\nI am so proud to tell you that beneath the altar of the caged chapel deep within this mountain, our Parish has finally achieved its longstanding goal.\\n \\nPraise be to the Goddess for illuminating my path to your bottled letter amongst the rocky shore! \\u0020"}','{"text":"Although it took time for me to write back initially, I am deeply thankful that I chose to do so. You must be close indeed to our Lady! I cannot help but feel humbled by your knowledge and generosity.\\n\\nTeiruun has never been like other Parishes. Our monks have always been far "}','{"text":"less pure or perfect than other ministers of Virtuo\\u2019s faith. But at last, the sin committed long ago by our founder can be rectified. Not only will our order again be led by a Virmari, but for the first time since the Goddess\\u2019s departure, new Virmari shall walk Drehmal. Our order will be a beacon to the world, and Virtuo\'s "}','{"text":"love will wash over every soul living on this continent.\\n\\n-Humbly yours, \\n\\nAbbot Balthysar of Teiruun.\\n "}'],title:"Letter of Thanks",author:""}
